meanings.definition: Not chivalrous; lacking the qualities of a knight.
meanings.sent1: The unchivalrous knight refused to help the damsel in distress.
meanings.sent2: His unchivalrous behavior towards his opponent was frowned upon.
meanings.sent3: It was unchivalrous of him to steal the last cookie from the jar.
meanings.sent4: Her unchivalrous actions on the battlefield shocked her comrades.
meanings.sent5: The unchivalrous prince never kept his promises, unlike the noble knights.

meanings.definition: Not courteous or honorable in behavior.
meanings.sent1: The unchivalrous man cut in line without apologizing.
meanings.sent2: Her unchivalrous remarks hurt his feelings deeply.
meanings.sent3: It was unchivalrous of him to ignore his friend's birthday.
meanings.sent4: The unchivalrous act of cheating in the game tarnished his reputation.
meanings.sent5: The unchivalrous behavior of the bully made the other kids feel unsafe.
